title: The Case of the Spirit Spell
description: It's softball season in Hillcrest and someone has a score to settle... but who?   It's softball season in the little mountain town of Hillcrest, Colorado. Penny and her witchy friends just want to enjoy the games. That becomes impossible when a dead body turns up! Penny, an amateur PI, knows that she has to help the police figure out who's responsible.  Could it be a werewolf woman with anger issues? Or maybe the grumpy catcher with a score to settle? Penny and her quick-witted familiar Turkey follow the clues... all the while trying to make heads or tails of the spell they're supposed to be mastering.  Can Spirit Magic help them brew up some answers — before it's too late?  Would you like to read the Hillcrest Witch Mystery series in order? Here’s your guide:  Prequel: The Case of the Love Spell Book #1: The Case of the Power Spell Book #2: The Case of the Banishing Spell Book #3: The Case of the Desire Spell Book #4: The Case of the Trust Spell Book #5: The Case of the Vision Spell Book #6: The Case of the Voice Spell Book #7: The Case of the Earth Spell Book #8: The Case of the Water Spell Book #9: The Case of the Air Spell Book #10: The Case of the Spirit Spell
author: Amorette Anderson
